content: this pattern is crocheted using bulky yarn such as big twist or lion brand jiffy bulky yarn or 2 strands of worsted weight yarn held together if using bulky yarn you will need appox 93-100 yards or just under 3 ozs if you are using worsted weight yarn you will need between 186 - 200 total yards of yarn if you crochet tightly use a n 9 mm hook if you crochet loosely use a k hook to crochet this hat pattern see notes about if you should crochet 11 or 12 rounds before adding trim
